snippet: A Pennsylvania ruling requiring a government-issued photo ID card to vote is a sign that Republicans have manipulated legislation for their own ends.
abstract: Editorial condemns decision by Judge Robert Simpson of the Commonwealth Court of Pennsylvania to refuse to halt a Republican-backed law requiring a government-issued photo ID to vote; notes that law, which will have a disparate impact on minorities who tend to vote Democratic, is a disturbing illustration of how the Republicans have manipulated legislation for their own ends.
lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania ruling requiring a government-issued photo ID card to vote is a sign that Republicans have manipulated legislation for their own ends.

headline.seo: Missed Chance to Reject Voting Barriers
headline.main: Missed Chance to Reject Voting Barriers
headline.print_headline: Missed Chance to Reject Voting Barriers
